The end of an era

Ladies and gentleman, I herby announce the impossible. The Nunaweb project has been officialy sined off to a new responsible person.
Let us enjoy this decisive and peaceful moment with a drink of your choice. Prost!

After setting up a PC remotly in India, with the purpose of the providing the international company a way to test Zubax interfaces and controllers, I started the work on the redesign of the website.


Monday-Friday, July 31th - August 4th


A visit to Helsinki

For everybody interested what the region has to offer, I highly recommend visiting Helsinki. It may only house 200.000 more inhabitants than Tallinn, but it is far more lively, with people meeting in many different parks, several interesting museums, a beautiful walkable city and vibrant nightlife.

You can get ferry for around 25€ in one direction, though the prices for eating and drinking in Helsinki are higher than in Tallinn, with around 15€ per Portion, compared to around 10-13€ in Tallinn.

In Helsinki I really enjoyed the art museum Amos Rex which displayed mostly modern art which was still pretty grounded and not overly expressionistic.


Saturday-Monday, August 5th-7th
